publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1052.1 Carolyn Leckie: Action to Promote Women in Scotland-As an amendment to motion (S2M-1052) in the name of Ms Margaret Curran, insert at end "and, in order to turn aspiration into reality, requests, in respect of the nursery nurses, that COSLA enters into national negotiations with UNISON to resolve the current dispute." Supported by: Frances Curran*, Colin Fox*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Tommy Sheridan*, Rosie Kane*
